 2017-15072017-12-01ESDC,  NR,  TB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectMilca Kwangwari Remisssion Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits a total of sums paid or payable by MILCA KWANGWARI 1) under Part I of the Income Tax Act, as repayment of Canada child tax benefits received for the 2008 and 2009 base taxations years, respectively; and 2) under the Universal Child Care Benefit Act as repayment of benefits received in the 2009 and 2010 taxation years.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2017-0082 Publication Date: 2017-12-13
AttachmentsAttachment
